# MarketplaceV3EnglishAuctions.executeSale() method

Close the english auction for both the seller and the bidder

## Example

```javascript
// The ID of the auction you want to close
const auction = "0";
await contract.englishAuctions.executeSale(auctionId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
executeSale(auctionId: BigNumberish): Promise<ethers.providers.TransactionReceipt>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description          |
| --------- | ------------ | -------------------- |
| auctionId | BigNumberish | the auction to close |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;ethers.providers.TransactionReceipt&gt;

the transaction result

## Remarks

Closes the Auction and executes the sale for both parties.
